title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.30 - KEEP RIGHT EXCEPT TO PASS Sign (R4-16) and SLOWER TRAFFIC KEEP RIGHT Sign (R4-3)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.30 - KEEP RIGHT EXCEPT TO PASS Sign (R4-16) and SLOWER TRAFFIC KEEP RIGHT Sign (R4-3)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 00A The KEEP RIGHT EXCEPT TO PASS (R4-16) and SLOWER
TRAFFIC KEEP RIGHT (R4-3) signs shall only be used in conjunction with orders
or regulations requiring such actions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
